font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vi. 快速地经过：to pass quickly or abruptly from one place or condition to another
【例】 Memories of the evening flitted through her mind. 关于那一晚的记忆在她脑海中一掠而过。
【近】 dance, dart, fleet, flick, flirt, flutter, hurry, rush, zip
【反】 plod 沉重缓慢地走
【记】 近于fleet, flight
